revised_title: Morphological Analysis of Trypanosomes in Nyasaland: Wild-game Strains and Human Strains Comparison
tldr: The study investigates the morphology of various strains of the trypanosome causing disease in humans in Nyasaland, focusing on the wild-game strain. The researchers compare the morphology of the trypanosome strains isolated from antelopes with the human strains, providing insights into disease transmission and potential treatment options.
